multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have an itchy rash on my feet with redness, scaling, and the skin is weeping and crusting.
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
I have been experiencing these symptoms for 2 months.
Do you have a history of similar symptoms or any other skin problems in the past?
No, I have no remarkable past medical history.
Are the symptoms present on both feet or just one foot?
The symptoms are present on both feet.
Do the symptoms get worse after wearing shoes or in humid conditions?
Yes, the symptoms get worse after wearing shoes for long hours at work and my socks become soaked daily due to profuse sweating.
Final Diagnosis: Athlete's foot (Tinea Pedis)
